1.label: On Off Status After Power Failure
1.description: On Off Status After Power Failure.  Default: all relays restore to previous state

options.label: all relays restore to previous state

2.label: Switch Type for Relay 1 (Sw1)
2.description: Switch Type for Relay 1 (Sw1).  Choose the wall switch type you want to connect to the Sw1 terminal.  Default: toggle switch (state changes whenever the switch is toggled)

options.label: toggle switch (light on when switch is up/off when down)
toggle switch (state changes whenever the switch is toggled)
garage door (momentary mode for Z-Wave control)

3.label: Switch Type for Relay 2 (Sw2)
3.description: Switch Type for Relay 2 (Sw2).  Choose the wall switch type you want to connect to the Sw2 terminal.  Default: toggle switch (state changes whenever the switch is toggled)

options.label: toggle switch (light on when switch is up/off when down)
toggle switch (state changes whenever the switch is toggled)
garage door (momentary mode for Z-Wave control)

4.label: Switch Type for Relay 3 (Sw3)
4.description: Switch Type for Relay 3 (Sw3).  Choose the wall switch type you want to connect to the Sw3 terminal.  Default: toggle switch (state changes whenever the switch is toggled)

options.label: toggle switch (light on when switch is up/off when down)
toggle switch (state changes whenever the switch is toggled)
garage door (momentary mode for Z-Wave control)

5.label: LED Indicator Control
5.description: LED Indicator Control.  Choose if you want the LED indicator to turn on when any of the relays are on or if all of them are off, or if you want it to remain on or off at all times.  Default: On when all relays are off

options.label: On when all relays are off
On when any relays are on

6.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 1
6.description: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 1.  Sets the time (in minutes) after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on.  Range: 1-65535.  Default: 0 (disabled)

7.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 1
7.description: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 1.  Sets the time (in minutes) after which you want relay 1 to automatically turn on once it has been turned off.  Range: 1-65535.  Default: 0 (disabled)

8.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 2
8.description: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 2.  Sets the time (in minutes) after which you want relay 2 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on.  Range: 1-65535.  Default: 0 (disabled)

9.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 2
9.description: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 2.  Sets the time (in minutes) after which you want relay 2 to automatically turn on once it has been turned off.  Range: 1-65535.  Default: 0 (disabled)

10.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 3
10.description: Auto Turn-Off Timer for Relay 3.  Sets the time (in minutes) after which you want relay 3 to automatically turn off once it has been turned on.  Range: 1-65535.  Default: 0 (disabled)

11.label: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 3
11.description: Auto Turn-On Timer for Relay 3.  Sets the time (in minutes) after which you want relay 3 to automatically turn on once it has been turned off.  Range: 1-65535.  Default: 0 (disabled)

12.label: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW1
12.description: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW1.  Default: enabled

options.label: local control disabled with enable on/off reports

13.label: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW2
13.description: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW2.  Default: enabled

options.label: local control disabled with enable on/off reports

14.label: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW3
14.description: Enable/Disable Manual Control for SW3.  Default: enabled

options.label: local control disabled with enable on/off reports

15.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer Unit for Relay 1
15.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-Off time for Relay 1.  Default: minutes

16.label: Auto Turn-On Timer Unit for Relay 1
16.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-On time for Relay 1.  Default: minutes

17.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer Unit for Relay 2
17.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-Off time for Relay 2.  Default: minutes

18.label: Auto Turn-On Timer Unit for Relay 2
18.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-On time for Relay 2.  Default: minutes

19.label: Auto Turn-Off Timer Unit for Relay 3
19.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-Off time for Relay 3.  Default: minutes

20.label: Auto Turn-On Timer Unit for Relay 3
20.description: Choose between second, minutes, and hours as the unit for Auto Turn-On time for Relay 3.  Default: minutes

21.label: Normally open/close for Relay 1
21.description: Decide whether you'd like Relay 1 to be normally open (NO) or normally closed (NC). Default normally open.

options.label: normally open (relay reports off when it's open / switch is off and on when it's closed / switch is on)
normally closed (relay reports off when it's open / switch is on and on when it's closed / switch is off)
normally closed (relay reports off when it's closed / switch is off and on when it's open / switch is on)

22.label: Normally open/close for Relay 2
22.description: Decide whether you'd like Relay 2 to be normally open (NO) or normally closed (NC). Default normally open.

options.label: normally open (relay reports off when it's open / switch is off and on when it's closed / switch is on)
normally closed (relay reports off when it's open / switch is on and on when it's closed / switch is off)
normally closed (relay reports off when it's closed / switch is off and on when it's open / switch is on)

23.label: Normally open/close for Relay 3
23.description: Decide whether you'd like Relay 3 to be normally open (NO) or normally closed (NC). Default normally open.

options.label: normally open (relay reports off when it's open / switch is off and on when it's closed / switch is on)
normally closed (relay reports off when it's open / switch is on and on when it's closed / switch is off)
normally closed (relay reports off when it's closed / switch is off and on when it's open / switch is on)

24.label: DC Motor Mode
24.description: Sync Relay 1 and Relay 2 together to prevent them from being activated at the same time. Default disabled.

options.label: DC motor mode disabled (relays will always turn on whenever activated)
DC motor mode enabled (relay checks the status of the other relay after being triggered and shuts the other relay off before activating so that only one of the relays is on at a time)
